publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-506 Tommy Sheridan: Austria—That the Parliament expresses its great concern at the establishment of a new Austrian Government involving Jörg Haider’s far right Freedom Party; believes that this presents a potential threat to the values of freedom, democracy and individual rights that should be at the heart of the European Union, and calls upon Her Majesty’s Government to make representations to the Austrian Government and the European Union expressing these concerns.
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Shona Robison*

S1M-506 Tommy Sheridan: Austria-That the Parliament expresses its great concern at the establishment of a new Austrian Government involving Jörg Haider's far right Freedom Party; believes that this presents a potential threat to the values of freedom, democracy and individual rights that should be at the heart of the European Union, and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to make representations to the Austrian Government and the European Union expressing these concerns. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shona Robison, Scott Barrie*, Allan Wilson*
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Bristow Muldoon*
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Cathy Jamieson*

S1M-506 Tommy Sheridan: Austria—That the Parliament expresses its great concern at the establishment of a new Austrian Government involving Jörg Haider’s far right Freedom Party; believes that this presents a potential threat to the values of freedom, democracy and individual rights that should be at the heart of the European Union, and calls upon Her Majesty’s Government to make representations to the Austrian Government and the European Union expressing these concerns. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shona Robison, Scott Barrie, Allan Wilson, Andrew Wilson, Bristow Muldoon, Cathy Jamieson
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Alex Neil*
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Elaine Smith*

S1M-506 Tommy Sheridan: Austria—That the Parliament expresses its great concern at the establishment of a new Austrian Government involving Jörg Haider’s far right Freedom Party; believes that this presents a potential threat to the values of freedom, democracy and individual rights that should be at the heart of the European Union, and calls upon Her Majesty’s Government to make representations to the Austrian Government and the European Union expressing these concerns. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shona Robison, Scott Barrie, Allan Wilson, Andrew Wilson, Bristow Muldoon, Cathy Jamieson, Alex Neil, Elaine Smith
S1M-506 Austria (lodged on 4 February 2000) Fiona McLeod*, Trish Godman*

S1M-506 Tommy Sheridan: Austria—That the Parliament expresses its great concern at the establishment of a new Austrian Government involving Jörg Haider’s far right Freedom Party; believes that this presents a potential threat to the values of freedom, democracy and individual rights that should be at the heart of the European Union, and calls upon Her Majesty’s Government to make representations to the Austrian Government and the European Union expressing these concerns. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Linda Fabiani, Mr Gil Paterson, Tricia Marwick, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Shona Robison, Scott Barrie, Allan Wilson, Andrew Wilson, Bristow Muldoon, Cathy Jamieson, Alex Neil, Elaine Smith, Fiona McLeod, Trish Godman
